page.title: 01WYCLIFFE COMMUNITY COLLEGE
page.content: Our block is on the western outskirts of Leicester City.It has a mixture of both council and private housing estates,industrial estates,public parks and countryside. The main type of housing is council houses on two large estates called New Parks and Braunstone.The private houses are mainly in the Leicester Forest East ,Kirby Muxloe and Glenfield areas. Two public parks take up a large area of the block and provide various recreational activites in the form of playgrounds, golf courses, sports fields etc. The industrial estate has some important firms on it and give employment to both the local people and other areas of Leicester.
